column5: Can anyone tell me where the best place to mount the transducer for a bow fishfinder is? Can I mount it to the trolling motor ?
Yup, the trolling motor is the best spot.  You can just use a hose clamp and clamp it on the motor housing. Just watch the wire running down the shaft.....I found it to be a PITA.  Sinker
Eagle makes a kit for putting a transducer on the bottom of your trolling motor. Here is a pic of one on my transom trolling motor. I don't think it would be any different up front.
Thats exactly what I had in mind. Thanks for the pic
or get it built in. ie universal sonar on the minn kotas
